name: CubeBoom
description:
A Game Jam game produced in 36 hours for the Fresh Jam 2017 Game Jam hosted at Teesside University.

CubeBoom is a WarioWare inspired game, finish all the sides of the cube before it explodes!

Made by team 'The Bad Guys' consisting of:

  • Louis Tang (Game Design / Sound Design)
  • Nathan Chandler-Gibson (Game Design / Art)
  • Andreas Cealera (Game Design / Art)
  • Daniel Bennett (Game Design / Art)
  • Joshua Stevenson (Team Lead / Programming)
